text: wmma yadulu ealaa qurb mwdthm lilmuslimin 'ana fryqana minhum (whm wafd alhbsht lamaa samieuu alqran) fadt 'aeyunuhum min aldame fayqnu 'anah hqq manzil min eind allah teala, wsddaqu biallah watabaeuu rswlh, wtdreu 'iilaa allah 'an ykrmhm bisharaf alshahadat mae ammat muhamad ealayh alslam ealaa al'umam yawm alqyamt
